issue.title: [Go] Rename ipc tool from 'arrow-json-intergration-test' to 'arrow-json'
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9896](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9896). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are five tools in go/arrow/ipc/cmd directory. The other four tools are named the same with that described in the code. But the 'arrow-json-intergration-test' is different. The code name it "arrow-json". So maybe it would be better that this directory renamed to 'arrow-json'

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9896?focusedCommentId=17189099) by FredGan (fredgan):*
`[~sbinet]`

Hi, I tried to solve it, but failed. Seems the name "arrow-json-intergration-test" is used in many languages. So I give it up.
